nested_fields.name: shelf_structure
nested_fields.description: Physical structure of the shelf fixture

nested_fields.name: total_shelves
nested_fields.description: Total number of horizontal shelves

nested_fields.name: fixture_id
nested_fields.description: Unique identifier for this shelf fixture (e.g., "store123_aisle5_bay2")

nested_fields.name: shelf_numbers
nested_fields.description: List of shelf numbers from bottom to top (must have length = total_shelves)

nested_fields.name: shelf_type
nested_fields.description: Type of fixture

nested_fields.name: width_meters
nested_fields.description: Estimated width of fixture in meters

nested_fields.name: height_meters
nested_fields.description: Estimated height of fixture in meters

nested_fields.name: shelves
nested_fields.description: Detailed information for each shelf level

nested_fields.name: shelf_number
nested_fields.description: Shelf identifier (1=bottom, counting up)

nested_fields.name: has_price_rail
nested_fields.description: Whether shelf has price label strip/rail

nested_fields.name: special_features
nested_fields.description: Unusual characteristics (slanted, wire mesh, divided sections, damaged)

nested_fields.name: has_empty_spaces
nested_fields.description: Whether significant gaps exist on this shelf

nested_fields.name: empty_space_details
nested_fields.description: Details about empty spaces

nested_fields.name: estimated_total_gap_cm
nested_fields.description: Total empty space in centimeters

nested_fields.name: non_product_elements
nested_fields.description: Items on shelves that are not products

nested_fields.name: security_devices
nested_fields.description: Security measures (grids, magnetic tags, plastic cases, bottle locks)

nested_fields.description: Marketing materials (shelf wobblers, hanging signs, price cards, banners)
